member.name: T:NetCoreWebApiMVP.SwaggerDefaultValues
member.summary: Provides the operation filter to use when generating Swagger documentation.

member.name: M:NetCoreWebApiMVP.SwaggerDefaultValues.Apply(Microsoft.OpenApi.Models.OpenApiOperation,Swashbuckle.AspNetCore.SwaggerGen.OperationFilterContext)
member.summary: Applies the filter to the specified operation using the given context.
member.param: The operation to apply the filter to.
